text: Ingrid van Houten-Groeneveld (21 October 1921 â€“ 30 March 2015) was a Dutch astronomer. She worked at the Leiden Observatory. She analyzed new asteroids. She is thanked for finding several thousand new asteroid discoveries. Van Houten-Groeneveld died on 30 March 2015, at the age of 93, in Oegstgeest, Netherlands. Leidse sterrenkundige Ingrid van Houten overleden (21 oktober 1921-30 maart 2015), Astronomie.nl, 2015. Retrieved on 31 March 2015. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch astronomers
title: Ingrid van Houten-Groeneveld
